attributes.action: resign following his decision to use the police as a political force in arresting the Conservative Home Affairs spokesperson for releasing information that embarrasses the Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The decision to arrest a Conservative Home Affairs front bencher puts this goverment on a par with the worst governments in the world. Britain is a multi-party democracy not a totalatarian state despite the efforts of this prime minister. The Prime Minister, who has called for change of Government in countries like Zimbabwe, should follow his own advice and resign.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
